name: Express diagnostics of the probability of neurosis
interpretation: 0-23 points: This number corresponds to low neuroticism and indicates emotional stability, a positive background of experiences (calmness, optimism), initiative, self-esteem, independence, social courage, ease in communication. 24 or more points: This number corresponds to a high probability of neurosis (neuroticism) and evidence of severe emotional excitability, resulting in negative emotions (anxiety, tension, restlessness, irritability, confusion) about the lack of initiative that shapes the experiences associated with the frustration of desires, on egocentric personal orientation, which leads to a hypochondriacal fixation on somatic sensations and personal shortcomings, difficulties in communication, social timidity and dependence.

questions.question: Do you think that you are internally tense?
I'm often so wrapped up in something that I can't sleep
I feel easily vulnerable
I find it hard to talk to strangers
Do you often get a feeling of indifference and fatigue without any special reasons?
I often get the feeling that people are looking at me critically
Do you often have useless thoughts that don't leave your head, even though you try to get rid of them?
I 'm pretty nervous
I don't think anyone understands me
I'm quite irritable
If they weren't against me, my business would be more successful
I take troubles to heart too closely and for too long
Even the thought of possible failure excites me
I had some very strange and unusual experiences

All day long I dream and fantasize more than I need to

I often struggle with myself not to show my shyness
I would like to be as happy as other people seem to be
Sometimes I get shivers or chills

Do you sometimes feel a sense of fear even in the absence of real danger?
Criticism or reprimand hurts me very much
Sometimes I get so restless that I can't even sit still

I do a lot of things that I have to repent of
Mostly I'm happy

Sometimes I feel really worthless
Often I just feel bad
I dig a lot into myself
I suffer from feelings of inferiority
Sometimes everything hurts
